overview: In 2004 they discovered a new planet , since then known as planet 9 .  This is an attempt to visualize textures , surfaces and organisms of this so called planet 9 , in an very abstract macro way, set to an pulsating original sound score trying to abduct the viewer into an out of this world audio-visual experience.  All shots are live action and practical effects, no cg was used.  Directed by Clemens Wirth
title: Kinsetsu Textures from Planet-9
